game.name: Summit Smash
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Drop your opponents in the narrowing upward field, watch out for traps and overcome challenging obstacles to come first!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Drop your opponents in the narrowing upward field, watch out for traps and overcome challenging obstacles to come first!
